item.description:
“We're a group of IT professionals and job seekers who meet on the 4th Wednesday of every month at the Tavern in the Square, in Central Square, Cambridge”

Agenda:

6:00 - 6:30 pm:  Refreshments and networking 
6:30 - 7:00 pm:  Individual introductions to the group (who you are / what you're looking for)
7:00 - 7:30 pm:  Job hunting tips
                           - who's hiring / interviewing 
                           - tools and technologies / what's hot, what's not
                           - job hunting resources, other places to look 
7:30 - 8:00 pm:  More networking / information exchange

If you're a hiring manager, recruiter, or entrepreneur looking to hire staff, please feel free to bring along handouts about your company and open positions and/or business cards. Looking forward to seeing you all there!

group.name: IT Job Seekers Greater Boston (Java, .NET, SQL, LAMP, etc.)

item.name: IT Job Seekers Greater Boston Meetup
